targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS "Dev Count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  ("public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard')
 
   AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account')
   
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account-console')
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'admin-cli')
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'broker')
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    (
      "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'realm-management'
    )
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    (
      "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'security-admin-console'
    )
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    "public"."client"."description" = 'CSS App Created'
  )

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS "Test Count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  ("public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard')
 
   AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account')
   
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'account-console')
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'admin-cli')
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    ("public"."client"."client_id" <> 'broker')
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    (
      "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'realm-management'
    )
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    (
      "public"."client"."client_id" <> 'security-admin-console'
    )
    OR ("public"."client"."client_id" IS NULL)
  )
  AND (
    "public"."client"."description" = 'CSS App Created'
  )

panels.title: Average Number of Clients by Environment

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) AS "count"
FROM "public"."client"
WHERE ("public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard'
   
   AND ("public"."client"."client_id"  like  'service-account-team%')
   )

SELECT count(*) AS "count"
FROM "public"."client"
WHERE ("public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard'
   AND "public"."client"."service_accounts_enabled" = TRUE)

SELECT count(*) AS "count"
FROM "public"."client"
WHERE ("public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard'
   AND "public"."client"."service_accounts_enabled" = TRUE)

panels.description: note CSS Account APIs are only created inprod

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) AS "count"
FROM "public"."client"
WHERE ("public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard'
   AND "public"."client"."service_accounts_enabled" = TRUE)

panels.title: Service Accounts Prod

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "public"."client"."protocol" AS "protocol",
  COUNT(*) AS "count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  "public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard'
AND  ("public"."client"."client_id" not in ('account', 'account-console','admin-cli','broker','realm-management','security-admin-console'  ))
GROUP BY
  "public"."client"."protocol"
ORDER BY
  "public"."client"."protocol" ASC

SELECT
  "public"."client"."protocol" AS "protocol",
  COUNT(*) AS "count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  "public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard'
AND  ("public"."client"."client_id" not in ('account', 'account-console','admin-cli','broker','realm-management','security-admin-console'  ))
GROUP BY
  "public"."client"."protocol"
ORDER BY
  "public"."client"."protocol" ASC

SELECT
  "public"."client"."protocol" AS "protocol",
  COUNT(*) AS "count"
FROM
  "public"."client"
WHERE
  "public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard'
AND  ("public"."client"."client_id" not in ('account', 'account-console','admin-cli','broker','realm-management','security-admin-console'  ))
GROUP BY
  "public"."client"."protocol"
ORDER BY
  "public"."client"."protocol" ASC

panels.title: Number of CSS Team Accounts in Standard - Client selected CSS API Account

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
count (distinct   "public"."client"."client_id")

FROM
  "public"."client"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."keycloak_role" AS "Keycloak Role" ON "public"."client"."id" = "Keycloak Role"."client"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."user_role_mapping" AS "User Role Mapping" ON "Keycloak Role"."id" = "User Role Mapping"."role_id"
WHERE
  ("public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard')
    AND (
    "public"."client"."description" = 'CSS App Created'
  )
   AND  (  "User Role Mapping"."user_id" IS NOT NULL )

  LEFT JOIN "public"."user_role_mapping" AS "User Role Mapping" ON "Keycloak Role"."id" = "User Role Mapping"."role_id"

panels.title: Number of Clients with Roles PROD

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 count( distinct   "public"."client"."client_id") AS "client_id"  ,
  "Client Scope"."name" AS "Client Scope__name"

FROM
  "public"."client"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."client_scope_client" AS "Client Scope Client" ON "public"."client"."id" = "Client Scope Client"."client_id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."client_scope" AS "Client Scope" ON "Client Scope Client"."scope_id" = "Client Scope"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."keycloak_role" AS "Keycloak Role" ON "public"."client"."id" = "Keycloak Role"."client"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."user_role_mapping" AS "User Role Mapping" ON "Keycloak Role"."id" = "User Role Mapping"."role_id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."user_attribute" AS "User Attribute - User" ON "User Role Mapping"."user_id" = "User Attribute - User"."user_id"
WHERE
  (
    "public"."client"."description" = 'CSS App Created'
  )
  AND (  "public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard')
 
  AND (

("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidbasic')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidbasic-saml')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidboth')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidboth-saml')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidbusiness')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidbusiness-saml')
OR  ("Client Scope"."name" = 'azureidir')  
 OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'azureidir-saml')    
 OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'githubbcgov')
OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'githubbcgov-saml')
 OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'githubpublic')
 OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'githubpublic-saml')
OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'idir')
OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'idir-saml') 
OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bcsc')
OR ("Client Scope"."name" LIKE 'bcsc%')   
  )

  AND (
     "User Role Mapping"."user_id" IS NOT NULL
  )

  group by   "Client Scope"."name" 

  order by   "Client Scope"."name"

WHERE

  )
  AND (  "public"."client"."realm_id" = 'standard')
 
  AND (

("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidbasic')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidbasic-saml')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidboth')
    OR ("Client Scope"."name" = 'bceidboth-saml')

OR  ("Client Scope"."name" = 'azureidir')
